website_summaries.verdict: Though the brand isn't as popular as competitors, the formula is very similar – plus you get a lot for the price.
pros: With 1% Clotrimazole – one of the most effective anti-fungal medications, it tackles problem areas and soothes itching
5 tubes for one price also makes this pick an awesome deal
cons: Mixed reviews for how well it works on tough fungal infections such as ringworm

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for tinia versicolor. I had red non painfull blotches all over my back and some of my chest that was re-occurring every summer. I ignored it for years and finally decided to try an antifungal. Within 4 days of applying this stuff twice daily the blotches faded, and in a week the blotches were compleatly gone. I have had the blotches reoccur in small areas several times since my initial use and two days of application on these spots have eliminated it. All this and I havent even been through one tube! Great deal! I highly recommend it for Tinia Versicolor.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Nathan

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolute GARBAGE! It does not work. If you want to be miserable then buy this stuff. I don't want my money back I just want Amazon to ban this stuff form their site for being fraudulent. Also Amazon, if you are listening, it would be nice if there was a garbage can rating system as well as a star rating system because this stuff deserved 5 garbage cans all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Really bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after 2 weeks of treatment with Right Aid clotrimazole. My infection was almost gone and skin was healing. I had 2 more weeks to go and decided to use this product, due to its cheap price. Was a bad decision. My itchiness came back few minutes after application. I could not stop scratching that's how bad it gotten. I literally had to run to Right Aid to get their product and get some relief. And sure enough the moment I applied Right Aid product the itchiness was gone and I didn't scratch it anymore. I really not sure what this Amazon product has in it, but something that was really bad for me. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Watered down!!!
customer_reviews.text: Watered down! Is not the same as store-bought clotrimazole cream. Does not work even though it says it's the same strength and ingredients. I contacted the seller and they only responded saying this order has been fulfilled. That is no help at all. What a waste of money for something that is now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: brittney

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is cheap
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the pricing structure here. I was going to buy a tube of clotrimazole at Walmart for $8 and instead bought a ton of tubes on Amazon. My wife thought I was crazy but, hey, it's the same price! This stuff seems to be the same as any clotrimazole you buy.
customer_reviews.author: rickatplay

customer_reviews.title: Finally,  a product that will kill athlete's foot fungus.
customer_reviews.text: I am active, and perspiring a lot brings about the dreaded athlete's foot fungus. I have tried umpteen products over the years and nothing works as well as this product. It took about two weeks of twice-daily applications between the toes, but completely cleared up my athlete's foot fungus, between the toes and even under one toenail. The product spreads easily and goes a long way. The amount that arrived is quite enough to do the job, with a healthy reserve left over if the fungus ever returns. I recommend this product to anyone who has the stubborn fungus like I did. Be patient and give it the days it needs to work. It really knocks it out.
customer_reviews.author: Yarburger

customer_reviews.title: Spend more money, buy the brand name anti-fungal
customer_reviews.text: I found this product much less effective than Lotramin. As much as I hate to spend much more money, I found the brand name product cheaper when comparing results/$$
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it and forget the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I guess you can't please everybody - by reading those negative reviews but I found this stuff to be the EXACTLY SAME as a tube of Rite Aid generic .5 oz. 1% Clotrimazole cream that I paid $8.50 for!!!! To treat my condition of jock itch it would be costly buying those expensive Rite Aid tubes. So I thought of amazon and I find FIVE 1 oz. tubes of 1% Clotrimazole cream for under $7.00 including shipping and no tax. And it WORKS and I have enough to treat this skin problem. Oh, the expiration date was 10/2020. This is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: After having used the Equate Clotrimazole cream for years, I tried switching to this due to the significantly lower cost. Well, you get what you pay for. At the first sign of re-occurrence of a rash, I started using this. 3 days later, the rash and itching were unbearable so I headed for Wal-Mart and purchased the Equate formulation. I Applied it that night and the next day my condition was dramatically improved. Either this contains no Clotrimazole or there's another ingredient that provokes an allergic response in me. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dodge DeBoulet

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and Greasy
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed. It was light and easily absorbed into the skin. It has changed. It is now heavy and very greasy. It won't rub into the skin and sticks to everything.
customer_reviews.author: DTB

customer_reviews.title: It works! Arrived quickly. Good expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! The item arrived quickly. Yes, this is a lot of tubes, but it is a great price and the expiration date is 2 1/2 years from now. My feet were a little itchy, so I thought this might be helpful because I might have athletes foot. After just two applications, I noticed a huge difference. Not only were my feet no longer itchy, but they were no longer dry and flaky. (I had no idea that these were also symptoms.) I am going to keep using it twice a day, morning and night, after thorough washing and drying.
customer_reviews.author: mom300

customer_reviews.title: Read this review, it can save your foot.
customer_reviews.text: I got a terrible reaction from this. So far over a week of trying to heal. Do not buy this under any circumstances. Tried to return, but return policy date is over. Missed work because of this. Cost me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: really crucial to incorporate in skincare routine if you want to gradually but eventually improve your tinea versicolor. keep using 2x a day and within a few weeks you'll see light improvements already.
customer_reviews.author: Tayyaba

customer_reviews.title: Different manufacturer? Bad rash.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this in the past for tinea versicolor with no issues, but this time had a really harsh skin reaction. I believe it may have to do with being the Chinese manufacturer versus the South Korean. I had to stop using it, and switched to the Walmart Equate brand, which you can tell is a different thickness when applied and has given me better results already for a marginally greater price. Also made in Canada. If it weren’t for the past positive experiences the review would be one star. But I definitely won’t be buying again, not knowing which manufacturer will be producing it. Not worth the gamble. Would rather have the spots than this reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W

customer_reviews.title: It really does work!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product! It really does work better than any expensive medicine from the Phamarcy. I’ve tried all kinds of ointments and creamed for itching underneath my breast and this is the only one that have given me long term relief! I will definitely be buying from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Margie t brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The stuff I buy at the store cost 8 dollars per each one....so, when I bought this stuff, i expected only 1..but got a pack of 5...and it has the same active ingredient that kills fungus. So far, I used it and it relieved the itch of my althelete foot...wow, and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Jshi

customer_reviews.title: Worked Fast For Me - Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Since highschool football (several decades ago) i've had this re-occurring off/on and annoying fungas which would flare up during hot months or exercise. Tried lots of things but honestly couldnt be bothered to keep at it for months...just not worth it. Got this and wow, just days after starting using this it was gone..seriously was surprised and finally pleased, no more issue and if it starts to come back, just a couple of days clears it up. Highly recommend this...didn't want the 5 pack but it was cheap enough to try and damn, it worked great so happy to have multiple now.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Notvreally good
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work as I was expecting. The smell is too strong and sticky. Did not make any effect on me, and made my skin t itch
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: This is full garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Effect is fully reverse. Strong itching appearing after short time of applying it. Tried 3 times, effect is the same. Last time, after almost fully cured with using apple vinegar, tea tree oil and coconut oil, applied this for one hour, and got again very strong itching.
customer_reviews.author: Ashot Martirosyan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Came promptly, and there are five in their original boxes like one would find in a drug store. The cost for all five 1 oz tubes equals the cost of one 0.5 ounce tube in local stores. Expiration date March 2021, so it is not short dated product. As far as effectiveness, I haven't used it yet, but my fungal infection is a very difficult one to treat, so I will probably go through multiple tubes before I will know, but clotrimazole has worked in the past. But at least it will not cost me a lot of money to treat. Compared to the brand name product, this seems to be a thicker cream.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: burns
customer_reviews.text: Burns my skin, worse than the itch and gave me no relief
customer_reviews.author: Gregg W Sirrine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for Jock Itch
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product a few times for minor jock itch. It works well it the infection is not serious. I find that if you have a serious case, you may want to get something like Lotromin. (Note: many use Lamisil but I cannot as I'm allergic to it) Both Lotromin and Clotrimazole are safe to use with my sensitive skin. Clotrimazole is a fine value and if your case is not too serious, I'd recommend it. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used two tubes of this stuff over the course of at least 2 months. This product did not make my athletes foot go away or help with it in any way. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kelle Keyles

customer_reviews.title: incredible bulk value
customer_reviews.text: works just as well as name-brand 1pc .5oz product from the local pharmacy priced at $12, this is a no-brainer if you regularly experience topical fungal infection from being dirty, sweaty and outdoors. killed off any noticeable markings in less than 10days and got 5pc 1oz tubes for $8, proving retail markup is just as much a ploy as exoplanetary colonization.
customer_reviews.author: hankfrennig

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product doesnt help me with my ringworm at all. It doesnt even relieve the itch and it doesnt feel cool in my skin either. I had a lot of hope on this and hoping that it would help as much as the Lotrimin. Truly disappointed. It really stucks. I don't know why other reviewers said this was helpful. It is definitely not a good product for ringworm.
customer_reviews.author: Karry

customer_reviews.title: That rash on your junk's not gonna go away -- less you start using topical cream everyday.
customer_reviews.text: It runs contrary to some of the confident reviews also posted here, but I found this product to work better and faster than the Terbinafine-based products, which never seemed to work for me. Consistency does seem to be important, so to paraphrase the highly underrated 1998 movie "Baseketball" -- (sung) "that rash on your junk's not gonna go away -- less you start using topical cream everyday.."
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Same product for less
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help treat my daughter's diaper rash. Works great and SO much cheaper than buying individual creams at the drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up my problem
customer_reviews.text: I've had a fungus on my feet and legs for years, it was weird but I went to the doctor and he suggested a couple of active ingredient to look for in a cream and this showed up as an Amazon ad in yahoo with in 3 hrs of my visit and I hadn't looked for any yet BUT it had what I needed, it took 7 tubes to clear but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Used as directed it will work.
customer_reviews.text: I live on the south Texas coast and if they sold this stuff in gallon tubes I'd buy it. My wife was recently given a prescription by a fancy office dermatologist for a fungal problem. You can see this coming can't you? It was this exact same 1% Clotrimazole!
customer_reviews.author: Lost Alascan

customer_reviews.title: Lotra-who? This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I got Jock itch for the first time in my life... It was so damn uncomfortable. This stuff worked great, exact same ingredients as the name brand stuff, but for a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Fights ringworm fast!
customer_reviews.text: I am prone to fungal infections as I do martial arts and these are easy to contract from sweat and stuff from communal mats. This cream works well to get rid of ringworm and athlete's foot. And it's a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cream seems to do a better job than a store brand even though both are 1% strength.
customer_reviews.author: v. putin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the brand names but without the price. Provides nearly instant relief and is thick and covers well, (see pic), so you don't have to use the whole tube at once. Clears itchy, red skin areas in just a few days. It doesn't cost an arm and a leg, so you can use what you need. Also helps with toenails even though it says it is not for toenail fungus. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: judyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as prescription alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: Pricing was excellent, much cheaper than at drug store chains. So far after several liberal quantity treatments it is ineffective for athlete's foot. I wonder if the ointment is not as strong as the 1% listed. Will have to go back to a prescription which I have used effectively in the past (Fluocinonide) which costs more but can use alot less per treatment.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to read description
customer_reviews.text: this probably works for what it was intended for. I purchase this as I had a rash on my wrist and was trying anything to get rid of it. Discovered later that my only success was steroids because I had inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Greene

customer_reviews.title: Heals yeast diaper rashes
customer_reviews.text: Helped clear up my son's yeast rash fast. It was a terrible yeast one that I couldnt get rid of with other creams but just a few days of applying this under his other diaper rash cream and he was all healed up. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective!
customer_reviews.text: Effective as the name brand stuff at a fraction of the cost. I usually buy the generic version of such products since, as the ad implies, you only have to check the concentration of active ingredients to see that this will work just as well as the name brands. It did the job I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Good for mild cases
customer_reviews.text: I like this cream. It does takes longer to work than some other over the counter antifungal medications that cost more money. If you have a mild case of tinea, it might help. If it is a more serious case, get something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Woman

customer_reviews.title: Killer value!
customer_reviews.text: Add it into your family lotion bottle in le bathroom to ward off weird skin stuff over time. Use at full strength if treating a current problem. Great value for the money, never a bad thing to have on hand :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Controls topical fungus
customer_reviews.text: I successfully use this product to prevent a toenail fungus from spreading to other nails. I also use it as an odor preventer at skin folds instead of using dangerous, expensive deodorant/antiperspirant.
customer_reviews.author: Msmoskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Roulette
customer_reviews.text: Had a terrible reaction to this ointment. First started with severe itching, larger spread of rash, then my skin was weaking(raw skin) and peeling off, with a slight infection. Stopped using it right away and my feet were alot better without it. It didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adan borja

customer_reviews.title: AVOID !!!
customer_reviews.text: Within 30 hours of the first application of this cream, the problem spread exponentially, and started itching terribly. The Clotrimazole 1% USP cream I had purchased originally at the drug store had just about killed the fungus ( it had never caused itching) when I used up the last of it. When I switched to this, I now have bright red, itchy, blotchy fungus all over (and beyond) where the original outbreak was centered. I even have it in new places. If I could give negative starts, I would. UNSAFE.
customer_reviews.author: Ewosha

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and cheap - was hoping for a great product given the majority of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective and cheap - was hoping for a great product given the majority of the reviews. It's not as effective as lotramin and some tubes have a scent some do not. Inconsistent and watered down
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Sends in packs of 6
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this not realizing that it was a pack of 6 wish I could send the other 5 back, they’re just sitting in my closet not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Abriah Todd

customer_reviews.title: Effective to prevent athletes foot.
customer_reviews.text: A nice smooth cream. I use it twice a week to prevent athletes foot when I am living in the humid climate of the Philippines. Convenient 1 oz tubes. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -non-greasy -works well (when you follow the directions) -price-point Cons: -You, someone you know, or an animal you care about, has ringworm. :( Sorry, dude. It'll get better. <3
customer_reviews.author: Naerwyn

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about the 1st week and then made my condition worse
customer_reviews.author: Olufe511212

customer_reviews.title: Not the same formula
customer_reviews.text: This is not that same as it was previously. I have bought this cream 2 or 3 times before and it cured my symptoms. With the last shipment I got, the cream actually worsened my symptoms. Can't return now as it has been over 30 days. In the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Better to spend few bucks more and get something that does what it says. It doesn't
customer_reviews.author: Vegan world

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic product
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't suit me. It's making lot of itching and discomfort. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nishant Singh

customer_reviews.title: Takes mu!tiple applications to work.
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a toenail fungal issue. It took a lomg time to work, with multiple applications. It took over 3 weeks to resolve the issue using this product alone.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: A PLUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this instead of monistat and I could not be more pleased. I ordered the package of 5 which was a lot cheaper than each one individually. In the use of this cream it solved my itch and prevented me from having to seek doctor help.
customer_reviews.author: Redkiss

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use to treat a fungal infection on a guinea pig. Did not work! Ended up using Corona Fung-A-Way Spray. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: Rachel LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Made my condition worsen
customer_reviews.text: Using this product caused my condition to worsen. I switched to a name brand product and now I am improving. Extremely disappointed in the time I lost to treat the problem and the stress caused by watching it get worse from using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Stinks, But Works
customer_reviews.text: Really strong smell on this medicine. It seems to work, though. I'm using it mainly because I'm sharing the shower with someone who has fungus and don't want to get it. But it's working. I haven't gotten it. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McGee

customer_reviews.title: I am sure it is fine. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen this product yet. I had it sent to my daughter's place in Austin, Texas and she will be bringing it to me at the end of this month. I am all the way in Brasil. This is a hard-to-find expensive product here. I am sure it is fine. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CBSM

customer_reviews.title: Works but takes a while on Tinea Versicolor.
customer_reviews.text: Took a while on my"tinea versicolor". But yes it worked. I believe Selsun Blue shampoo/body wash with salicylic acid works better for "tinea".
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Tried for 3 weeks, condition worsened
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all for me. Went with name brand spray which worked a little better and weird enough Puriya balm did it for me.
customer_reviews.author: DRouse

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for an adult who uses diapers and gets fungal rashes on occasion. Excellent price and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. My husband and daughter seem to be prone to ring worms for whatever reason.. I never get them, but anyway it is a miracle worker for them.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya B.

customer_reviews.title: Was a great creme but now it's made in China and it stinks, literally(like dog urine).
customer_reviews.text: *update* I have ordered this cream quite a few times now but this last batch had such a bad odor(smelled like dog urine) that I had to throw them out. I compared the packaging and it look identical except one thing. The old batch was made in Korea and the new batch showed made in China. Possibly bad batch or different chemicals, either way it was unusable. Cream worked great. Noticeably diminished the amount of foot fungus in the first week.....
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried several products for my severe athletes feet, but this worked best. Cleared it up in about four weeks and I used it another 2 weeks to make sure.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE READ

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: These are actually large tubes and you get a bunch of them for so cheap. This is a fantastic price, way better than any store.
customer_reviews.author: Comm C

customer_reviews.title: Ended up going back to Lamsil.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this version would work, but don't really like the effectiveness or how is spreads out compared to more expensive brands like lamasil.
customer_reviews.author: TBL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I think this is the same stuff they sell at Dollar Tree.
customer_reviews.author: lowell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality product really helpful to eliminate fungus in couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cleared up my horrible itch in a matter of days
customer_reviews.text: This product, along with anti-fungal wash from Purely Northwest, cleared up my horrible itch in a matter of days. What a relief! Thank you for this stuff and know that I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great cream.
customer_reviews.text: I used the cream for rosecea. Also used it on the corner of my lips which was breaking of. The cream worked quickly, did not smell and left skin soft. Tried several over the counter products which cost more and did not work. I am very satisfied with the outcome and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mamacita

customer_reviews.title: No stars for this product but you have to click 1
customer_reviews.text: The product was not returnable or we would have returned it for certain. It must have some really bad chemicals in it. Burned and made eyes water. Do not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rearick

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I love it really love it !!!!works really good I used for everything it’s my 3rd time getting it and gone for more thanks amazon for this !!! And the price it’s 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Eric Eliasgbmzmkz

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal for a bunch of tubes! At the grocery store one tube is like $10.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Sewage
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying the multi-pak. The first batch was orderless and worked. All tubes of the product in the second batch smell like sewage. Same company and packaging as the first batch and the expiration dates are good. Afraid to use it. This item isn’t eligible for return so in the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: It works well killing fungi
customer_reviews.text: My feet gets better after using it on day one. I have been using it for a month. Now the skin on my feet looks health again. Will continue use it for another month. Highly recommend if you have fungi infection on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: kettle

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Worked much better than drugstore name brands at a fraction of the cost. And I received at least a sim month supply.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Turner

customer_reviews.title: STINKS like garlic
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it works or not, because I've only used it twice and can't stand the smell. It reeks of garlic.
customer_reviews.author: BSteele

customer_reviews.title: Great deal of Clotrimazole cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream doesn't cure my infection completely, but works wonder as a treatment. Expiration date is 05/2021 which I find good enough for 5 tubes. With this low price it's a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Anatolii Gl

customer_reviews.title: great price. Second time I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, great price. Second time I have purchased. Will continue as long as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Melwel

customer_reviews.title: ... inspired to buy this in bulk and were sorely disappointed. The cream was watery and did not work
customer_reviews.text: We were inspired to buy this in bulk and were sorely disappointed. The cream was watery and did not work. We ended up throwing it away. It doesn't compare at all with the effectiveness of a similar product at the local drug store. Sorry you did not offer a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Shops4value

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive alternative to store bought fungicides
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be effective, but not as good as the store bought products. I mix and match.
customer_reviews.author: Calazon

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very Cheap to compare with a prescription medicine. But effective for common fungal infection.
customer_reviews.author: young youn

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if it's made in China.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the box said "Made in China" instead of Korea and didn't think too much about it, BAD MISTAKE. It gave me an awful skin reaction that still hasn't gone away. Not sure of who to contact about this since Amazon says it isn't eligible for a refund. Don't trust Chinese products, especially if its something you will put on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cerverik Chomip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute godsend when our house a little kitten gave our whole household ringworm.
customer_reviews.author: Al Mc

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and gets rid of fungus as long as you keep up with it
customer_reviews.author: LittleStinker87

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dog's fungal ear infections. Works great. Seems to work better than spray or powder forms.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Not the expected  quality/strength
customer_reviews.text: I previously gave this five stars, but have dropped it to a one because it didn’t work nearly as well as the last order, leading me to believe it wasn’t the advertised strength.
customer_reviews.author: JDiab

customer_reviews.title: Effective remedy.
customer_reviews.text: Works as desired. Clears itching in a couple days, but continued use for a couple weeks in necessary to assure that condition is cured.
customer_reviews.author: RobertKarl

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Great Price Didn't Work for Me Though
customer_reviews.text: As stated in title. I tried to play doctor and failed. But the product is very cost effective as compared to buying in store. Great Value
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Helped clear up my tinea versa. I had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped clear up my tinea versa. I had a huge patch on my back. Over time this ointment and (sulfur soap) helped shrink the patch on my back significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Too watery
customer_reviews.text: Too watery and can not do the job that lotrim does
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Formula has been changed and no longer seems to work...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this product. The first batch felt more like a light lotion and worked well and quickly. The second batch feels different, more like a thick cream. I've gone through a tube now and it doesn't appear to be working. Perhaps I have a bad batch. Regardless, I'll be picking up the name brand stuff from my local pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Digisplicer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Cream works as advertised but takes about a week before you start seeing results. After a week it works as advertised. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! This costs a fraction of what I've been paying for the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cjsmartypants

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Best over the counter cream I have found to treat angular chelitis. Cleared it up in a few days
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Foster

customer_reviews.title: Very irritating to the skin
customer_reviews.text: This is not similar medicine as the ones in drug store, it is very irritating to both my feet and hands when I apply it. I want to return it, but this product is not eligible for return somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoxi Wang

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Family Care Clotrimazole Anti Fungal Cream simply does not work, I highly doubt it contains any effective anti fungal ingredient. Went back to generic brands from CVS & Walmart and things cleared up quickly. If it seems too good a deal, it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: A waste
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as the kind from the store. It smells horrible and is a weird consistency. It made my rash worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused rash and unbelievable itching
customer_reviews.text: I had a minor itch- applied this product to the area and broke out into a full rash - it actually caused what it is supposed to prevent. Never itches so much in my life. I bought it because it was way cheaper than the name brand stuff but now I know why- no returns allowed so I just threw it all away.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for the skin issue I had and only made it worse.
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop using after a couple days since it only made my skin issue worse. Other products I've used work.
customer_reviews.author: C Anders

customer_reviews.title: Not for TV
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do anything for my versicolor. I used up one tube a week
customer_reviews.author: Jmeji

customer_reviews.title: Works great on yeast diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: Works great on yeast diaper rash, my baby's bottom was all healed up in a matter of hours... This is a must have for your "mom" arsenal if you have a baby around.
customer_reviews.author: Char-Kay

product_meta.title: Family Care Clotrimazole Anti Fungal Cream, 1% USP Compare to Lotrimin 1oz mhtCXm, Pack of 5
feature_bullets: Compare to the active ingredient of lotrimin.
